comments.raw_text:
For people who don't have Test Pilot or Feedback on Firefox 4, offering a entry in the menu for them to join user studies may help increase the participation. 

~6% people click on Help menu, it could be a good place to leverage.

comments.raw_text: We should consider pairing this with a checkbox in the installer.  In both cases though the resulting interface needs to be silent.  If we annoy users with opt-in and surveys, they are going to regret participating, and might even move off of the product itself.
